title: San Juan Island National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved          Â    Looking for how to get involved at San Juan Island? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.   NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in national parks.    Partners  Partnerships strengthen the enduring connection between the American people and their national parks.     Donate Donations are accepted and can be directly designated to benefit a favorite program or the park in general.    Work With Us The National Park Service seeks students, professionals and other qualified individuals from numerous academic disciplines and trades for a wide variety of internship, seasonal, and permanent positions available nation-wide. We encourage all interested and qualified persons to apply for jobs.    Planning   Learn more about park projects.
